〘ANNOUNCEMENT〙
Hello, everyone! September is coming along really soon, huh?
Do you have fanarts of ex-ID members that you don't mind sharing with us?
If yes, please submit them through: #19colorsproject !
The deadline is 🗓️August 31.

We're waiting for you!🌠
